amendment.description: To replace the funding for the Office of the Chief Readiness Support Officer with a $500,000,000 appropriation for the construction or improvement of primary pedestrian fencing and barriers along the southwest border.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5435 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 320.

action.text: Amendment SA 5435 proposed by Senator Sullivan to Amendment SA 5194. (consideration: CR S4197; text: CR S4197) To replace the funding for the Office of the Chief Readiness Support Officer with a $500,000,000 appropriation for the construction or improvement of primary pedestrian fencing and barriers along the southwest border.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5435 proposed by Senator Sullivan to Amendment SA 5194.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 5435 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 320.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 5435 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 320.
